options.content:
# covid-19 stats
## Data sources
 * [OpenZH](https://github.com/openZH/covid_19): hospitalisations data
 * [FOPH](https://www.bag.admin.ch/bag/en/home/krankheiten/ausbrueche-epidemien-pandemien/aktuelle-ausbrueche-epidemien/novel-cov/situation-schweiz-und-international.html): test data
 * [COVID-19 Re](https://github.com/covid-19-Re/dailyRe-Data): Re estimate
 * [bag_scrape](https://github.com/timoll/bag_scrape) - which is sourced from FOPH: everything else

targets.query: SELECT mean("value") FROM "cumulatedConfirmedForward" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
